PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: Base Address
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: This base address is the OCP base address used by SW to program OCP

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Start Capture
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Start capture by EMU0 signal or not

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Stop Capture
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Stop capture by EMU1 signal or not

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sampling Window
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The clock cycles window for eliminating repeating event detection

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Data Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Type of the data transfer to watch

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 0 SDMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 0 DMA read

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 1 SDMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 1 DMA read

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 2 SDMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 2 DMA read

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 3 SDMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 3 DMA read

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 0 SDMA Write
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 0 DMA write

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 1 SDMA Write
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 1 DMA write

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Display
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from display data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 0 Camera
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 0 camera data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 1 Camera
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from thread 1 camera data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DAP
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from DAP data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 0 DSP
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 0 DSP data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 1 DSP
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 1 DSP data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: USB HS
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from USB HS data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 0 M_DMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 0 M_DMA read data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 1 M_DMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 1 M_DMA read data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 2 M_DMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 2 M_DMA read data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 3 M_DMA Read
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 3 M_DMA read data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 0 M_DMA Write
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 0 M_DMA write data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Thread 1 M_DMA Write
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from Thread 1 M_DMA write data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: USB FS
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from USB FS data transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: SDIO
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable OCP from SDIO data transaction

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: What to Trace
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options of OCP stream to trace

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: DMA Qualifier
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options of setting DMA data qualifier

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MCmd
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MCmd DMA profile

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MReqSecure
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MReqSecure DMA profile

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MReqSupervisor
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MReqSupervisor DMA profile

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MReqCacheable
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MReqCacheable DMA profile

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MReqType
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MReqType DMA profile

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MRegModem
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MRegModem DMA profile

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAddrSpace
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the qualifier for MAddrSpace DMA profile

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable qualifier of the trace stream

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable qualifier of the trace stream

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable qualifier of the trace stream

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Enable qualifier of the trace stream

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier Value
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The enabled qualifier value to trace

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier Value
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The enabled qualifier value to trace

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier Value
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The enabled qualifier value to trace

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Qualifier Value
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The enabled qualifier value to trace

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Time Stamp Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of the time stamp type

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Burst Response
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of how to response burst error

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Compress
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable compress trace data or not

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Use Addresses Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The option of using defined two address to enable watch-point or trigger EMU0/EMU1

PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: Start Location
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Reference value of start program address

PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: End Location
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Reference value of end program address

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of setting trace trigger

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger-out EMU0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of setting output trigger for EMU0

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger-out EMU1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of setting output trigger for EMU1

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Use EMU Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The option of using EMU0/EMU1signal to trigger watch-point

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Start on EMU0
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Start watch-point on EMU0 high to low trigger

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Stop on EMU1
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Stop watch-point on EMU1 high to low trigger
